title: The Master’s Harem Growth Diary - Novel Updates
author: 水耘公子
description:
Legend has it that this is a novel about collecting a harem, emmm…

Legend has it that the master is a gentleman, but why does he always appear in front of naked girls?

Legend has it that the master has a preference for older women, but why is there a loli in his harem? Legend has it that the master does not meddle with politics, but why is he unable to wash clean of his relationship with the overlord of the empire? Legend has it that the master has a low position in society, but why is he the queen’s patronage? …Legend has it that the master likes to be alone, but why is the women around him increasing?>
